movies.title: Cowboys & Aliens
movies.synopsis: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.synopsis: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
movies.synopsis: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
movies.synopsis: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.
